name: Imaginosia
description:
Imaginosia is my submission to the 2022.1 Brackeys game jam, with the theme "It Is Not Real". I created a survival game where you could enter your imagination and change the way things work.

Controls:

Press space to pause (additional detail on controls and game mechanics can be found on the pause screen.)

Use the WASD keys to move in any direction.

Right click to fire your gun.

Left click to stab with your knife.

Left click while holding an item to use it.

If you find a mushroom, click on it to obtain hallucinogen. You can press "T" to use a hallucinogen and switch to the imaginary world.

Stereo headphones recommended.
